title: Canon Scanner email issue with Thunderbird
content: I'm hoping some one on here can help me with a Canon email issue, I have 4 win10 systems andd have Thunderbird and al use either Canon Lide 200 or Lide 210 scanners, a few months ago the ability to auto attach scanned documents to emails failed to work any more, since its a problem on all our systems I can only assume its a software update problem ? - 2 systems I can manually attach scanner documents to Thunderbird with MP Navigator EX 2.0 but the other 2 systems it doesnt recognise Thunderbird is even on my computer, I get a message that says there's no email client to attach it to or associated with the program, the Thunderbird program is the main and only email one set up on these. Can anyone help me with this ? Im really stumped

title: TB automatically downloading messages, despite Server settings for this being unticked
content:
After a recent update (to 130.0), TB has started automatically downloading messages, despite 'Automatically download new messages' being unticked in the Account Settings.

The account is set as a POP mail server.

Has anyone else had this problem and resolved it?

title: Random conents for emails
content:
Comment from one of our users: "thunderbird is really not working right for me... it's a mess on the 'sent' folder, with either no content shown or the wrong email appearing to the wrong people...", please see image (1).png, and "on this e-mail, an image appears that I never ever have seen in my life. Can I use something else, that is not webmail? XXX mentioned she uses outlook and doesn't have issues at all", see image (2).png.

I've tried the compact folders "fix". This fix appears to only work on Windows.

The user is on a Mac and out in the field. They are non technical. I'm seeing them tomorrow but don't really know what I can do for their dilema, apart from setup Outlook as they request.

This has been a long standing issue, I raised it two years ago. Sorry I can't really add anything useful. If you can get back to me with what error data can be collected I'm happy to upload it.
creator: osavill

title: Address book details pane is cut off / covered with a white box
content:
On one of my customers is using Thunderbird 128.2.3esr (64-bit) on Windows 10 (and I've seen this on another customer too)

The address book details pane is covered by a white box, such that the details are mostly obscured. I've added an attachment with a screenshot of the problem. It makes the address book inoperable.

This isn't a simple problem with maximising the window. I've tried minimising and maximising.

I didn't screenshot the full width, but the screenshot is half the screen width. The rest is just white inside the window frame (which is maximised). Screen resolution is 1920x1080 (recommended), so that's not the problem. Intel HD graphics with the latest available driver.

Any ideas how to fix it?
creator: bcraigie

title: Verzonden berichten niet zichtbaar in map Verzonden berichten
content: Ik gebruik Thunderbird versie 128.2.3esr en krijg bij het verzenden van email een foutmelding: Uw bericht is verzonden, maar door netwerkproblemen of fouten met de bestandstoegang is er geen kopie in uw map voor verzonden berichten (Verzonden) geplaatst. In bijgaand PDF document is de volledige foutmelding zichtbaar. In de bijlage staat ook mijn instellingen voor uitgaande mail en inkomende mail. Ik heb contact gehad met KPN en volgens hen zou mijn instellingen juist staan en verwijzen zij mij door naar Thunderbird. De berichten worden wel verzonden, maar zijn niet zichtbaar in de map verzonden. Als ik via webmail van KPN een bericht aanmaak en verzend, dan is dit bericht online wel zichtbaar in de 'Verzonden' map. Kunt u misschien hier naar (laten) kijken en mij een reactie geven. Of staat er toch iets niet goed in mijn instellingen. Dit probleem heb ik sinds vorige week. Alvast bedankt, Ad Weeda
creator: awn
